resolution_notes: Customer provided valid secondary ID verification after initial flag. Document quality issues resolved - lighting conditions caused unusual shadows on biometric scan. No fraud detected.
Large deposit ($25K) flagged. Customer explained as business sale proceeds. Unable to fully verify due to incomplete documentation. Closed with elevated monitoring.
Holiday shopping season - multiple legitimate purchases flagged velocity rules. Customer provided receipts. No fraud.
Home downpayment transaction flagged as anomaly. Customer provided mortgage documentation. Legitimate transaction.
Login from Portugal during vacation. Customer confirmed it was her. Added travel notification feature reminder to account.
